name: Clanker Hooklist
description: Clanker static and dynamic fee hooks for token launching

8453.name: Clanker Dynamic Fee Hook on Base
8453.description: Integrates with Clanker's v4 token launchpad to facilitate automatic fee claiming, Clanker protocol fee, per-chain mev games, and user controlled fee customization.

8453.name: Clanker Static Fee Hook on Base
8453.description: Integrates with Clanker's v4 token launchpad to facilitate automatic fee claiming, Clanker protocol fee, per-chain mev games, and user controlled fee customization.

8453.name: Clanker Static Fee Hook on Base - v2
